N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2K.04 - Arrangement and Size of Signs

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraphs 01, 04, and 05. INSERT the following paragraphs: Standard: 00A Where five or more businesses are signed, two

Tourist-Oriented Directional signs shall be used, one for businesses to the
left, and one for businesses to the right. Option: 03A At intersection approaches where four or fewer
facilities are shown, the left-turn, right-turn, and straight ahead destination
panels may be combined on the same sign. Notes
